title: At midday: Resource stocks push TSX higher despite oil price drop - The Globe and Mail
description:
1. At midday: Resource stocks push TSX higher despite oil price drop  The Globe and Mail
  2. Stocks Extend Drop; Oil Futures Fall Below Zero: Markets Wrap  Yahoo Canada Finance
  3. North American markets stumble, oil craters to begin the week…
content:
Canadas main stock index edged higher in morning trading on Monday with the help of resource stocks.
At 11:48 a.m. ET, the S&P/TSX composite index was up 111.39 points, or 0.78 per cent, at 14,471.27.
